trends: There have been no other sightings in Flagler Beach
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: flat ovoid object going east in atlantic ocean/florida
divs: sighting detailsi was in flagler beach, fla., oct. 2003, approx. 9-9:30pm, at corner of rd 100 & a1a south, turned to look out to sea, approx. 9-9:30 pm, flagler bch. fl. october 2003.flat ovoid\round object heading east outward in ocean. saw outer surface as "volcanic appearance",ie.:black & red as volcanic flow appearance, could see waves coming off left side(as i was north of object)as it slowly went down into ocean & outwardly to the east, i watched this object until out of my sight-about 2-3 minutes. next day, new reports from daytona beach\ ormond beach, of many sighting "blue lights" going up coast northward from daytona beach. there was no sound that night of motors, engines, no sound but of the ocean!!!!
